name: Ultra Night mode
description:
a really simple filter to make every site dark
May break some sites
additional_info:
It use invert filter to invert the color and use hue-rotate filter to make evrey color looks right.

And it also revert img, video, canvas back to its original color to ensure the medias won't break.

But it has four bug currently.
1. background with image won't be turn back to its original color (we don;t know whether this image is really a background or used as a media file)
2. make gif and video lag
3. will conflict with come sites that already has black background set (I force set background to white because site with transparent background bugs the css filter)
4. other bugs i really has no idea whats going on
